section.p: Any medication may be the subject of further instructions to the patient, for example to indicate that it should be taken with food, et cetera. This structure is included in the target substance administration or supply act using the <entryRelationship> element defined in the CDA Schema.

ol.li: SHALL conform to CCD Patient Instruction template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.49)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="PINSTRUCT" (CodeSystem: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.2 IHEActCode)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode
The code attribute of <statusCode> for all comments must be completed

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] text
The <text> element indicates the text of the comment. For CDA, this SHALL be represented as a <reference> element that points at the narrative portion of the document. The comment itself is not the act being coded, so it appears in the <text> of the <observation>, not as part of the <code>.
